column5: Hey guys,  Gotta keep this short, but on our way back from returning a rental movie this past sunday the kids and I stopped by the creek for a couple of bluegill.  To my surprise and Averie's excitement we were checked by an MNR officer.  He's new to the area and was out and about learning the tribs and trying to catch illegal steelheaders!    Luke was clapping and cheering on his big sister lol   They caught some fish...   Luke didn't want to hold his fish up for a picture haha   But Averie was very excited to have her picture taken with our local CO   And after a couple more of these...   We were on our way!   Enjoy your weeks!  Ryan & the kids!
Looks like a great outing Ryan Great to see the CO's out.
It is good to see the MNR guys out...I seen one in Meaford to...
I am 99% certain that CO checked my licence in Goderich about 6 months ago.
So awesome of you for taking your kids out, your kids are adorable!  Good to see the CO getting out to those smaller stretches of water too.  Thanks for the mini report
Great stuff Ryan. Speaking of steelheading the next month is prime time if you want to hook up.
Awesome report and pics Ryan Give Luke and Averie high fives for me Leechman

I was thinking the same thing Dutchy.  Isn't he the guy that looked at YOU when you told him what you are educated in  It was ALL YOUR FAULT too !  But hey, that particular CO was a very reasonable individual and earned both of our respect that day.
Great Report the Kids look like there having fun most of the time, I like Lukes face when he's holding the fishing rod, nice to see the C.O. out and took the time to have a picture taken Richard
